title: Ep. 1115 - The Paul Pelosi Conspiracy Theory
description:
Click here to join the member exclusive portion of my show: https://utm.io/ueSEl

Nancy Pelosi’s husband gets attacked by a Berkley nudist with a hammer in the middle of the night, Elon Musk cleans house at Twitter, and the Supreme Court prepares potentially to dismantle race-based college admissions.
